name: firebase-jest-testing
description: Tools for testing Firebase back-end features, using Jest.
author: <akauppi@gmail.com>

engines.node: 18: built-in fetch (no need for undici; less dependencies)
engines.npm: >= 7.7.0 because of this (only matters for 'npm publish') -> https://github.com/npm/cli/issues/2834

jest: Jest is left as a peer dependency, since the using project surely is aware of it (and may want to use a different version).
If you have problems, please raise an Issue (or update to latest Jest).

@google-cloud/firestore: Starting Jest 28.0.0-alpha.8 (and in 28.1.2), this is explicitly needed.
Native 'sample' works also without it, for some reason. Docker Compose 'sample.dc' doesn't.
firebase-admin: Seen as an implementation detail (not peer dependency), since the using application does not need to touch it,
or even be aware of it.
